text: traditional term for this is `diff`. HS staff since you use codemirror maybe this would help: <https://codemirror.net/demo/merge.html>

Idea - Choice field with display as “select” should enable another option - “multi-select field” or make it another option under Display As

Or make it a whole new field type all together whatever’s easier

I currently am creating a long list of booleans to solve this design problem. Having a field for it would be better.
